page.title: 02The Garage, Hilmarton.
page.content: The building is on the main road into Hilmarton and is brick built with metal vertically sliding doors. The roof is built of corrugated asbestos. There are four petrol pumps and a diesel pump, which can each carry 4000 gallons. The petrol is supplied by Ultramar. There is also a workshop for servicing and general repairs, and a shop that sells a variety of things, including refreshments. The workshop has two ramps and space to service three cars inside. There is space for six cars at the back. There are three men working at the garage. Apart from the workshop there is a spare parts room and an office where the keys are kept. The garage is open 08.30.- 19.00 hours Monday to Saturday. The garage is owned by Mr Craig.
